CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties has been improved to 4.5% with an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of almost 1 V. 10 Compared with the large number of publications on 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers applied in PSCs , less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. 9,9-dialkylfluorene
2. spirobifluorene

These are the names of specific materials that are being referred to in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here's the updated list of "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. 9,9-dialkylfluorene
2. spirobifluorene

The phrase "D-A alternating copolymers" does not refer to a specific material name, but rather a type of material. Therefore, it has been removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the list of valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 9,9-dialkylfluorene |
| spirobifluorene |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties has been improved to 4.5% with an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of almost 1 V. 10 Compared with the large number of publications on 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers applied in PSCs , less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. 4.5% - the improved power conversion efficiency (PCE) of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties.
2. 1 V - the open circuit voltage (Voc) of the polymer solar cells.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* 4.5%
* 1 V
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here's the updated list of "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, with only the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. 4.5% - the improved power conversion efficiency (PCE) of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties.

The entity "1 V" refers to the open circuit voltage (Voc) of the polymer solar cells, but it is not a direct measure of the value of a material property. Therefore, it has been removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated list of "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, with only the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.5% |

The entity "4.5%" refers to the improved power conversion efficiency (PCE) of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties.
